kickstart.post:
echo "Executing lifemapper-lab on FE"
echo " Add lmwriter user" ID=`/bin/egrep -i "^lmwriter" /etc/group` if [ "$ID" == "" ] ; then # adding lmwriter user with group /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" lmwriter else # adding lmwriter user, group already exists /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" -g lmwriter lmwriter fi
echo " Add solr user" ID=`/bin/egrep -i "^solr" /etc/group` if [ "$ID" == "" ] ; then # adding solr user /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Solr user" solr fi
echo " Sync users and restart autofs on FE and nodes" /usr/bin/systemctl restart autofs.service /opt/rocks/bin/rocks sync users /opt/rocks/bin/rocks run host compute "/usr/bin/systemctl restart autofs.service"
echo " Make FE directories and set permissions" # for writing web logs /usr/sbin/usermod -G lmwriter apache /bin/mkdir -p /var/www/tmp /bin/chown apache:apache /var/www/tmp
# FE directory NOT exported to /share, for web logs, uploads, cherrypy sessions /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/log/apache /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/sessions /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/tmpUpload /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lmscratch /bin/chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lmscratch
# for lmtrex, lmsyft apache/wsgi files /bin/mkdir -p /var/www/lmsyft /bin/chmod 755 /var/www/lmsyft /bin/mkdir -p /var/www/lmtrex /bin/chmod 755 /var/www/lmtrex
# FE directory exported to /share /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/syftorium_data/collections /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/syftorium_data/error_dwcas /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/syftorium_data/new_dwcas /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/syftorium_data/processed_dwcas /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/solr/data/cores /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmlab/solr/logs
# set lmwriter permissions on all of lmlab /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lmlab /bin/chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lmlab # reset solr permissions on solr subdir /bin/chown -R solr:solr /state/partition1/lmlab/solr /bin/chmod -R 775 /state/partition1/lmlab/solr
# Mounts /export/lmlab to /share/lmlab
lmlab &Kickstart_PrivateHostname;:/export/&
echo " Configure solr run-level management and install cores to solr data dir" /usr/bin/systemctl stop solr.service /usr/sbin/chkconfig --add solr /usr/sbin/chkconfig solr on /opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/solr-index /usr/bin/systemctl restart solr.service
echo " Enable mod-wsgi then restart apache" /opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/install-mod-wsgi /usr/bin/systemctl restart httpd.service
